recipes.title: Veggie Carbonara
recipes.description: A vegetarian twist on the classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, and vegetarian bacon.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy Arborio rice cooked with mushrooms, onions, garlic, and vegetable broth, finished with Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Quinoa Salad
recipes.description: A refreshing salad made with cooked quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, feta cheese, and a lemon vinaigrette.

recipes.title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
recipes.description: Bell peppers filled with a savory mixture of rice, black beans, corn, tomatoes, and spices, topped with cheese and baked until tender.

recipes.title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Assorted vegetables such as broccoli, bell peppers, carrots, and snap peas stir-fried in a flavorful sauce made with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.

recipes.title: Eggplant Parmesan
recipes.description: Slices of eggplant breaded and baked until crispy, then layered with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

recipes.title: Chickpea Curry
recipes.description: A fragrant curry made with chickpeas, onions, garlic, tomatoes, and a blend of Indian spices, served with rice or naan bread.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: A simple Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil leaves, olive oil, and balsamic glaze.

recipes.title: Vegetable Lasagna
recipes.description: Layers of lasagna noodles, ricotta cheese, assorted vegetables such as spinach, zucchini, and mushrooms, marinara sauce, and melted cheese.

recipes.title: Falafel Wrap
recipes.description: Crispy chickpea patties (falafel) wrapped in a warm pita with lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, and tahini sauce.
